add_subdirectory(catch2)
set(FRAMELESSHELPER_BUILD_STATIC ON)
set(FRAMELESSHELPER_NO_DEBUG_OUTPUT ON)
add_subdirectory(FramelessHelper)
add_subdirectory(openssl)
add_subdirectory(RapidJson)
add_subdirectory(spdlog)
add_subdirectory(sqlite3)
set(tinyxml2_BUILD_TESTING OFF)
add_subdirectory(tinyxml2)
add_subdirectory(win32)
set(CMAKE_DISABLE_TESTING ON)
add_subdirectory(zip)
set(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF)
add_subdirectory(zlib)
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
	target_compile_options(zlib PRIVATE -Wno-deprecated-non-prototype)
	target_compile_options(zlibstatic PRIVATE -Wno-deprecated-non-prototype)
endif()
